items.name: Margherita
items.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

items.name: Pepperoni
items.description: A popular choice featuring a tomato sauce base, mozzarella cheese, and lots of spicy pepperoni slices.

items.name: Hawaiian
items.description: Topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, and sweet pineapple chunks for a tropical twist.

items.name: Neapoletana
items.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizza made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella di bufala, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.

items.name: Capricciosa
items.description: A delightful combination of tomato sauce, mozzarella, artichokes, mushrooms, ham, and olives.

items.name: Romana
items.description: Features tomato sauce, mozzarella, anchovies, capers, and oregano, offering a distinct and savory taste.

items.name: Carbonara
items.description: A creative take on carbonara pasta with a sauce of cream, eggs, Parmesan, and pancetta atop a pizza crust.

items.name: Vegetariana
items.description: Loaded with fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives, on a tomato sauce base with mozzarella.

items.name: Four Cheese
items.description: A cheese lover’s delight combining mozzarella, Parmesan, gorgonzola, and fontina cheese on a tomato base.

items.name: Caprese
items.description: Inspired by the Caprese salad, this pizza is topped with cherry tomatoes, mozzarella di bufala, fresh basil, and a balsamic glaze.

items.name: Coca-Cola
items.description: The classic and refreshing cola beverage that pairs well with any meal.

items.name: Lemonade
items.description: A chilled glass of fresh lemonade, perfect for a tangy and sweet refreshment.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Freshly brewed iced tea, available sweetened or unsweetened, served with a slice of lemon.

items.name: Sparkling Water
items.description: A refreshing and bubbly alternative to still water, perfect for cleansing the palate.

items.name: Craft Beer
items.description: A selection of local craft beers to complement your pizza choice, with varying styles and flavors.
